JoinRequestDialog.title: Joinha mukamuri
JoinRequestDialog.inviteOnly: Iyi imba yakavanzika uye inoda kukokwa kuti ubatane
JoinRequestDialog.knockRequired: Imba iyi inoda application yekujoinha. Dzvanya bhatani riri pazasi kuti utumire kujoina chikumbiro
JoinRequestDialog.canJoin: Ino kamuri yeruzhinji, iwe unogona kujoina zvakananga

MessageList.noMessages: Iko hakuna meseji ikozvino, tumira meseji yekutanga kutanga hurukuro!

MessageVirturalList.noMessages: Iko hakuna meseji ikozvino, tumira meseji yekutanga kutanga hurukuro!
